sn3.4:1.2: Ekamantaṃ nisinno kho rājā pasenadi kosalo bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn3.4:1.3: “idha mayhaṃ, bhante, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṃ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn3.4:1.4: ‘kesaṃ nu kho piyo attā, kesaṃ appiyo attā’ti?
sn3.4:1.6: ‘ye ca kho keci kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti, vācāya duccaritaṃ caranti, manasā duccaritaṃ caranti;
sn3.4:1.9: “piyo no attā”ti, atha kho tesaṃ appiyo attā’.
sn3.4:1.11: Yañhi appiyo appiyassa kareyya, taṃ te attanāva attano karonti;
sn3.4:1.13: Ye ca kho keci kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti;
sn3.4:1.16: ‘appiyo no attā’ti; atha kho tesaṃ piyo attā.
sn3.4:1.18: Yañhi piyo piyassa kareyya, taṃ te attanāva attano karonti;
sn3.4:2.2: Ye hi keci, mahārāja, kāyena duccaritaṃ caranti, vācāya duccaritaṃ caranti, manasā duccaritaṃ caranti;
sn3.4:2.5: ‘piyo no attā’ti, atha kho tesaṃ appiyo attā.
sn3.4:2.7: Yañhi, mahārāja, appiyo appiyassa kareyya, taṃ te attanāva attano karonti;
sn3.4:2.9: Ye ca kho keci, mahārāja, kāyena sucaritaṃ caranti, vācāya sucaritaṃ caranti, manasā sucaritaṃ caranti;
sn3.4:2.15: Yañhi, mahārāja, piyo piyassa kareyya, taṃ te attanāva attano karonti;
